    • Method Detail

      • promotable

        public static boolean promotable(Pieces.Coord lastmoved)
        Checks if the last-moved piece is a promotable pawn
        Parameters:
        lastmoved - The pawn you want to test
        Returns:
        "true" if lastmoved is promotable

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • initboard

        public static void initboard()
        Creates the standard pieces and lays them out on the board.

      • movePieceTo

        public static boolean movePieceTo(Pieces.Coord from,
                                  Pieces.Coord dest)
        Moves a piece of "color" from "from" to "dest", with checks. The coordinates must be in the board. You cannot capture your own piece. The move must also be legal for your piece.
        Parameters:
        from - coordinate coming from
        dest - coordinate going to
        Returns:
        "true" if piece was successfully moved.

      • moveWithoutPrint

        public static boolean moveWithoutPrint(Pieces.Coord from,
                                       Pieces.Coord dest)

      • illegalmove

        public static void illegalmove()
        Prints out "illegal move" in a standardized way.

      • SchachgebotPruefen

        public static boolean SchachgebotPruefen()
        "Check for check" by searching the whole board for opponent's pieces, and then seeing if your king is in their list of possible moves.
        Returns:
        true if color is in check

      • checkMate

        public static boolean checkMate()
        If this worked it would move all your opponents pieces to all their legal spots to see if any of those spots results in them not being in check, in that case return false
        Returns:
        true if color is in check

      • contains

        public static boolean contains(java.util.ArrayList<Pieces.Coord> legals,
                               Pieces.Coord dest)
        Checks if a specific coordinate is in a legal moves list
        Parameters:
        legals - A piece's legal moves
        dest - A coordinate pair you are looking for
        Returns:
        true if "dest" is in "legals"

      • removePiece

        public static void removePiece(int x,
                               int y)
        Removes the place of a piece on the chessboard Does not actually delete the piece object
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of the piece to be removed
        y - y-coordinate of the piece to be removed

      • printBoard

        public static void printBoard(Pieces p)
        Prints the board with piece names, colors, in correct location. Alternating checkerboard design has blank space or ## if no piece.
        Parameters:
        p - The class that holds the ChessBoard object
